description: This trail is near the town of Livermore and is popular with bikers, hikers, and horseback riders. Numerous trails through the preserve can be combined for hikes and rides of assorted lenghts. The trail detailed in the GPS track data is a mix of fire road and single track. Note: As with most Calfornia area parks, bikes are restricted to fire roads only.
directions: N Livermore Ave) Left on Manning to Morgan Territory Rd.  Watch out for the small Morgan Terr road sign, easy to miss! Left on Morgan Territory to the top of the hill (6.3miles).  Caution: Morgan Territory rd is mostly a narrow one-laned road with turnouts.Drive 2 miles past the main parking to a turnout on the right opposite the signed trail head.
title: Morgan Territory Hike
